text: Molly Weaver (born 15 March 1994) is a former professional racing cyclist from Shropshire, who now rides for British amateur team Orbea Racing Team. Her first professional season began with the team in 2015, before a mid-season transfer to Liv-Plantur (now Team Sunweb). In 2018 she competed for the British team as their road captain. ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:English female cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Molly Weaver
